title: Shure SRH440A Over-Ear Wired Headphones for Monitoring & Recording, Professional Studio Grade, Enhanced Frequency Response, Work with All Audio Devices, Adjustable & Collapsible Design - 2022 Version
description: The SRH440A Professional Studio Headphones deliver enhanced detailed frequency response with accurate audio for podcasting, home recording and critical editing/mixing. The consistent and uncolored sound response provides a very accurate representation of the sound, making it ideal to take the best of the talent in a podcast or recording session. The increased isolation, the longer straight cable and the new design look great on camera.
